meta.name: Assignment Deadline Reminders with Notion and Email for Students & Teachers

name: Automated Assignment Reminder & Deadline Tracker for Students and Teachers

nodes.name: Notion - Get Assignments
nodes.notes: Queries the Notion database for assignments with due dates within the next 3 days. Replace 'your_notion_database_id' with your actual Notion database ID. Ensure 'Due Date' is a valid date property.

nodes.name: IF Assignments Exist
nodes.notes: This IF node checks if there are any assignments returned from the Notion query. Proceeds to send reminders if assignments exist, otherwise stops the workflow.

nodes.name: Send Email Reminder
nodes.notes: Sends an email reminder for each assignment. Uses fallback values if properties are missing. Update 'your_email@example.com' with your email and configure SMTP credentials. Ensure 'Email', 'Assignment Name', and 'Due Date' match your Notion database schema.

parameters.text:
Dear Student/Teacher,

This is a reminder for the assignment '{{$json['properties']['Assignment Name']['title'][0]['plain_text'] || 'Unnamed Assignment'}}' due on {{$json['properties']['Due Date']['date']['start'] || 'No Date Set'}}. Please ensure it is completed on time.

Best regards,
Your School Automation System
parameters.subject: Assignment Reminder: {{$json['properties']['Assignment Name']['title'][0]['plain_text'] || 'Unnamed Assignment'}}

nodes.name: No Assignments
nodes.notes: This node is a placeholder for when no assignments are due within the next 3 days. The workflow stops here if no assignments are found.

parameters.content:
## System Architecture
- **Assignment Tracking Pipeline**:
  - **Set Schedule For Trigger**: Initiates the workflow daily at 9 AM on weekdays.
  - **Notion - Get Assignments**: Retrieves upcoming assignments from Notion.
  - **IF Assignments Exist**: Filters for existing assignments.
- **Reminder Generation Flow**:
  - **Item Lists**: Processes each assignment individually.
  - **Send Email Reminder**: Sends email notifications to students/teachers.
- **Non-Critical Handling**:
  - **No Assignments**: Skips execution if no assignments are due.

nodes.name: SplitOutItems itemList
nodes.notes: Expands the list of assignments into individual items to process each one separately for sending reminders.

nodes.name: Set Schedule For Trigger
nodes.notes: This node triggers the workflow every weekday at 9 AM to check for upcoming assignment deadlines.
